item.title: Optimize GUID creation performance in .NET applications
item.description: Many .NET projects use well-known GUIDs as identifiers for activities, interop scenarios, database keys, and other purposes. It's common to see code like new Guid("01234567-8901-2345-6789-012345678901") throughout applications. While this approach is readable and straightforward, it comes with a hidden performance cost that can impact application startup time. This is a micro-optimization that primarily… Link to article: https://www.meziantou.net/optimize-guid-creation-performance-in-dotnet-applications.htm?utm_medium=social&utm_source=syndication

item.title: C# 14 Extension Members: Enhancing Polyfill Libraries
item.description: C# has long supported extension methods, allowing developers to add new methods to existing types without modifying the original type. However, this capability was limited to instance methods. With C# 14, the language introduces extension members, significantly expanding what you can extend. You can now add extension properties and extension static methods to existing types. This enhancement is… Link to article: https://www.meziantou.net/csharp-14-extension-members-enhancing-polyfill-libraries.htm?utm_medium=social&utm_source=syndication
